subject: Cybersecurity
title: Moonlight Maze: The First Major Cyber Espionage Case
description: A short lesson to help you apply Moonlight Maze: The First Major Cyber Espionage Case.

hook.text: In 1996, someone stole classified military data from the Pentagon for two years before anyone noticed.

buildup.text: Moonlight Maze was the first known state-sponsored cyber espionage campaign against the United States.

discovery.text: Attackers tunneled through university computers to reach military networks, stealing missile designs and troop data.

twist.text: The trail led to Russia, but attribution was nearly impossible. Moscow denied everything.

climax.text: Moonlight Maze proved that cyber espionage was the future of intelligence â€” and attribution was its biggest challenge.

punchline.text: They stole secrets for two years before anyone noticed.

quiz.question: What made Moonlight Maze historically significant?
